entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 04:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
